summary: REQ-55 appears implemented by adding a new ArticleTemplate in `frontend/src/content/articleTemplates.ts` and wiring template loading into the Admin Article Editor. REQ-56 appears largely implemented by adding guest-access public article queries in `backend/main.mo` and updating the public pages/hooks to use them. However, the new template includes a Markdown image referencing an asset that is not shown as added in the diff, so the acceptance criterion about Markdown images rendering correctly cannot be confirmed from the provided changes. Several substantial unrelated changes (auth/profile/admin guard, homepage redesign, branding updates, etc.) were introduced without being requested.

missing_requirements.requirement: If the new article includes Markdown images, they render correctly using the existing Markdown image support (no broken layout).
missing_requirements.reason: The new template content includes a Markdown image pointing at `/assets/generated/article-recruitment-india.dim_1600x900.png`, but the diff shows no added static asset files, so it is not verifiable that the referenced image exists and will render correctly.
evidence: File diff summary: Added files: none

hallucinated_features.description: Added user profile management (get/save caller profile) and expanded authorization/admin route guard behavior.
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested by REQ-55/REQ-56, which only require adding an article template and ensuring publishing/public visibility.

hallucinated_features.description: Redesigned homepage and updated site branding/logo and footer attribution/contact icons.
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested by REQ-55/REQ-56; BuildRequest explicitly focuses on the admin article template workflow and public article visibility.
evidence: frontend-file-summaries.txt (SiteLayout branding/logo changes, HomePage completely redesigned)

hallucinated_features.description: Added/changed Admin dashboard functionality around "Default Article Templates" with per-template "Create/Update & Publish" buttons and bulk recreate functionality.
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested; REQ-55 only requires the template to be selectable from the existing Admin Article Editor dropdown.
evidence: frontend-file-summaries.txt (AdminDashboardPage new template section and bulk recreate)

hallucinated_features.description: Implemented new backend public endpoints for listing/searching published articles and fetching published articles by slug.
hallucinated_features.reason: Not explicitly requested as new API surface; REQ-56 only requires that published articles appear on existing public pages. This may be an implementation choice beyond the request.
